trans-unit.source: Represents a control that raises its <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event repeatedly from the time it is pressed until it is released.
trans-unit.target: 表示控制項引發其<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref>重複事件的時間已按下直到釋放它為止。

trans-unit.source: A RepeatButton is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: RepeatButton 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，這表示它可以包含單一物件的任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或工作面板）。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: The RepeatButton class represents a control that is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: RepeatButton 類別代表<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>類似的控制項

trans-unit.source: However, repeat buttons give you control over when and how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 不過，重複的按鈕可讓您控制何時以及如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>就會發生事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: The RepeatButton raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event repeatedly from the time it is pressed until it is released.
trans-unit.target: RepeatButton 引發<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>重複事件的時間已按下直到釋放它為止。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property determines when the event begins.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>屬性會決定事件的開始時。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also control the interval of the repetitions with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Interval%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以控制的間隔與重複<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Interval%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Interval%2A>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the RepeatButton Control To apply the same property settings to multiple RepeatButton controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: RepeatButton 控制項以自訂適用於多個 RepeatButton 控制項使用相同的屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the RepeatButton, see [RepeatButton Syles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和專屬於 RepeatButton 的狀態，請參閱[RepeatButton Syles 和範本](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響如果該屬性會出現在按鈕控制項的預設範本，並使用的設定。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time, in milliseconds, the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> waits while it is pressed before it starts repeating.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的時間，以毫秒為單位， <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref>等候開始重複之前按下。

trans-unit.source: The value must be non-negative.
trans-unit.target: 值必須是非負數。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The amount of time, in milliseconds, the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> waits while it is pressed before it starts repeating.
trans-unit.target: 時間，以毫秒為單位， <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref>等候開始重複之前按下。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.KeyboardDelay%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是值<xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.KeyboardDelay%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time, in milliseconds, between repeats once repeating starts.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定以毫秒為單位，重複一次重複開始之間的時間量。

trans-unit.source: The value must be non-negative.
trans-unit.target: 值必須是非負數。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The amount of time, in milliseconds, between repeats after repeating starts.
trans-unit.target: 以毫秒為單位之後重複開始, 重複之間的時間量。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.KeyboardSpeed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是值<xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.KeyboardSpeed%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Interval*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Interval*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Interval*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Raises an automation event and calls the base method to raise the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件，自動化並呼叫基底方法，以引發<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RepeatButtonAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 提供適當<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RepeatButtonAutomationPeer"></xref>實作此控制項，做為一部分[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]基礎結構。

trans-unit.source: The type-specific <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 特定型別的<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>實作。

trans-unit.source: Responds to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 回應<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data for a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件資料<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Responds to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 回應<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data for a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件資料<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Called when a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> loses mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: 時呼叫<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref>失去滑鼠捕捉。

trans-unit.source: The event data for a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件資料<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostMouseCapture"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Reports when the mouse enters an element.
trans-unit.target: 當滑鼠進入項目的報表。

trans-unit.source: The event data for a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件資料<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Reports when the mouse leaves an element.
trans-unit.target: 當滑鼠離開項目的報表。

trans-unit.source: The event data for a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件資料<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Responds to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 回應<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data for a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件資料<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.target: 回應<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data for a <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> event.
